SectionOne.title: DeFi is simple
SectionOne.subtitle: At DeFi for People we aim to help users understand DeFi and its main advantages

Simulation.title: How much do you want to invest?
Simulation.recurringMessage: If every year you will invest
Simulation.text1: Whe consider two possible scenarios: optimistic and pessimistic
Simulation.text2: The value of each year is calculated by the formula:
Simulation.calculateValue: value = past year valye ( 1 + APY) + recurrent investment

strategies.title: Different
strategies.subtitle: strategies
strategies.presentation: We offer different strategies to get you started with DeFi in a simple way.
strategies.strategy1_description: This strategy allows the user to lend or borrow tokens in the Aave protocol
strategies.strategy2_description: This strategy allows the user to provide liquidity in the Uniswap V3 protocol
